content:
/>
Introduction
This topic describes the actions MSCs must take following the initial meeting with an IDES participant, including
summary of MSC actions upon the conclusion of the initial meeting
updating systems
requesting examinations and records
providing claim and examination information to the Physical Evaluation Board Liaison Officer (PEBLO)
handling evidence submitted by participants
scanning IDES evidence locally
shipping paper evidence to the scanning vendor
uploading electronic documents to the electronic claims folder (eFolder)
returning paper evidence
, and
processing paper documents in a timely manner
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
